subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Johan Franzen, Brian Rafalski and Tomas Holmstrom scored power-play goals for the Detroit Red Wings, in their 4-1 win against the Dallas Stars in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Johan Franzen, Brian Rafalski and Tomas Holmstrom scored power-play goals for the Detroit Red Wings, in their 4-1 win against the Dallas Stars in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
